results.name: Column 1 of triangle A104027, which is the matrix inverse of the triangle A056241 of even-indexed trinomial coefficients.
comment: Column 0 of triangle A104027 forms signed Hammersley's polynomial p_n(1) (A006846).
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Feb 26 2005
